title: (x) Shangri-Las logo - Thalia {Tim D}
content:
Any idea what font (assuming it is a font) the Shangri-Las logo is made from? Looks to me like the lower-case S is a different gothic typeface, but I'm wondering about the rest of the logo.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015044132im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Shangri_Las.jpg)
author: rotodesign

comments.content:
Thalia, the s appears to be correct  
 [http://www.searchfreefonts.com/fonts/t12.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015044132/http:/www.searchfreefonts.com/fonts/t12.htm "http://www.searchfreefonts.com/fonts/t12.htm")

Tim

Thanks for the tip -- that version is pretty crudely autotraced, but I did manage to find a nicer (yet still freeware) version here:

[http://www.haroldsfonts.com/thaleia.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015044132/http:/www.haroldsfonts.com/thaleia.html "http://www.haroldsfonts.com/thaleia.html")
Your blog is fun to read! Nice job! Check this out [Press Release Service](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015044132/http:/www.wiredworx.net/).
